sentence.Network_en: He was consultant rheumatologist at the Royal Hampshire Hospital.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是皇家汉普郡医院的风湿病学顾问。

sentence.Network_en: The only reason you're thinking autoimmune is because you're a rheumatologist.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有一个原因使你想到了自体免疫反应你是个风湿病大夫.

list.abs: Currently , many rheumatologists wish to see patients with early RA at the first available opportunity ., 当前 , 许多关节炎医师希望看患者与早期的镭在第一可利用的机会.

entry.def: Rheumatology is the area of medicine that is concerned with rheumatism, arthritis, and related diseases.

means.word_mean: 1. a physician specializing in rheumatic diseases

auth_sentence.content: If your rheumatologist doesn't refer you to a physiotherapist, ask your GP.
auth_sentence.res_content: If your rheumatologist doesn't refer you to a physiotherapist, ask your GP.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If your rheumatologist doesn't refer you to a physiotherapist, ask your GP.

auth_sentence.content: You don't have to see a rheumatologist, but if you'd like to, ask your GP.
